attributes.action: Scrap stamp duty and inheritance tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These taxes are, to put it plainly, a tax on moving house and a tax on dying. In both cases they are taxes on money that has already been taxed and should not be a part of the government's income. Also, in both cases they were introduced at a high enough level so as not to affect the general public but now, due to inflation and especially house prices, they will impact on most people.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Scrap stamp duty and inheritance tax."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11916.asp

Prime Minister's Office
